title: Authors and Citation
text: Brown D, de Sousa K (2022). agera5r: Toolbox Downloading Extracting Copernicus AgERA5 Data. R package version 0.0.0.9007, https://agrdatasci.github.io/agera5/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {agera5r: Toolbox for Downloading and Extracting Copernicus AgERA5 Data},   author = {David Brown and Kaue {de Sousa}},   year = {2022},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9007},   url = {https://agrdatasci.github.io/agera5/}, }

title: Toolbox for Downloading and Extracting Copernicus AgERA5 Data
text: R package agera5r toolbox download extract data “Agrometeorological indicators 1979 present derived reanalysis” dataset (aka AgERA5). https://cds.climate.copernicus.eu/cdsapp#!/dataset/10.24381/cds.6c68c9bb?tab=overview download function provides programmatic access Copernicus Climate Data Store download AgERA5 data.

title: Toolbox for Downloading and Extracting Copernicus AgERA5 Data
text: agera5r package distribute data, provides access Climate Data Store python cdsapi. specific details license agreenment downloading using data please check license : https://cds.climate.copernicus.eu/api/v2/terms/static/licence--use-copernicus-products.pdf

title: Toolbox for Downloading and Extracting Copernicus AgERA5 Data
Toolbox for Downloading and Extracting Copernicus AgERA5 Data
text: download AgERA5 data first install Climate Data Store API. Please follow instructions : https://cds.climate.copernicus.eu/api--

title: Toolbox for Downloading and Extracting Copernicus AgERA5 Data
text: following example downloads daily 2m_temperature data year 2015
code: download_agera5(agera5_var = "2m_temperature",                 agera5_stat = "night_time_minimum",                 day = "all",                 month = "all",                 year = 2015,                 path = "C:/custom_target_folder" )

title: Toolbox for Downloading and Extracting Copernicus AgERA5 Data
text: agera5r package relies functionality available open source packages. Python cdsapi R package reticulate used access Python cdsapi functions R. R package terra used extract data nc files. R package fs used efficiently search list files.

title: Toolbox for Downloading and Extracting Copernicus AgERA5 Data
text: Please aware still development version package. free use purposes warranty.

what: Downloads AgERA5 data from the Copernicus Climate Change Service - Copernicus Climate Data Store — ag5_download
title: Downloads AgERA5 data from the Copernicus Climate Change Service - Copernicus Climate Data Store — ag5_download
text: data downloaded Copernicus Climate Change Service (C3) using Copernicus Climate Data Store (CDSAPI) Python library https://github.com/ecmwf/cdsapi function  provides programmatic access dataset information data license, please visit: https://cds.climate.copernicus.eu/api/v2/terms/static/licence--use-copernicus-products.pdf download data valid CDS account, CDS API key install Python CDSAPI. Please follow instructions : https://cds.climate.copernicus.eu/api--

title: Downloads AgERA5 data from the Copernicus Climate Change Service - Copernicus Climate Data Store — ag5_download
code: ag5_download(variable, statistic = NULL, day, month, year, time = NULL, path)

title: Downloads AgERA5 data from the Copernicus Climate Change Service - Copernicus Climate Data Store — ag5_download
text: variable character variable downloaded. See details statistic character required variable "2m_temperature". See details available options. day character Day week requested data. day = ""  download days requested month month character Month requested. month = "" download months requested year. year numeric (Integer) Year download. 1979 - 2022 time Character required "2m_relative_humidity". See details available options. path Character Target folder local hardrive e.g. "C:/agera5". folder exist path indicated without ending "/"

title: Downloads AgERA5 data from the Copernicus Climate Change Service - Copernicus Climate Data Store — ag5_download
text: cloud_cover liquid_precipitation_duration_fraction snow_thickness_lwe solar_radiation_flux 2m_temperature 2m_dewpoint_temperature precipitation_flux solid_precipitation_duration_fraction snow_thickness vapour_pressure 10m_wind_speed 2m_relative_humidity

title: Downloads AgERA5 data from the Copernicus Climate Change Service - Copernicus Climate Data Store — ag5_download
text: Variable "2m_temperature" requires indicate least one following options statistic: 24_hour_maximum 24_hour_mean 24_hour_minimum day_time_maximum 2m_temperature day_time_mean night_time_mean night_time_minimum

title: Downloads AgERA5 data from the Copernicus Climate Change Service - Copernicus Climate Data Store — ag5_download
text: Variable "2m_relative_humidity" requires indicate one following options time: 06_00 09_00 12_00 15_00 18_00

what: Extract AgERA5 data stored in a local hardrive — ag5_extract
title: Extract AgERA5 data stored in a local hardrive — ag5_extract
text: ag5_extract family wrapper functions extract data AgERA5 data files previously downloaded Copernicus Climate Data Store. functions use package terra read *.nc files extract requested data given location dates. dates one value extracts single observation specified variable location. dates character vector length == 2, extract time series specified variable location, first dates value start date second end date.

title: Extract AgERA5 data stored in a local hardrive — ag5_extract
code: ag5_extract(lon, lat, dates, variable, ..., path)  # S3 method for default ag5_extract(lon, lat, dates, variable, ..., path)  # S3 method for data.frame ag5_extract(dataset, variable, ..., path)

title: Extract AgERA5 data stored in a local hardrive — ag5_extract
text: lon longitude value location interest lat latitude value location interest dates dates extracting specified variable, either single character vector length 2 variable AgERA5 variable extract, see details available options path path folder containing AgERA5 files statistic character See details variables require indicate statistic

what: Valid variable values to be used in W4D52drhwjjYIYnOEstCkaQoyLxgUR2G-1-
